dcterms:description: Benchmark set for the IEEE WCCI-2020 competition on evolutionary computation for the electric vehicle routing problem, containing instances for the Capacitated Electric Vehicle Routing Problem (CEVRP).

dcterms:description: Benchmark set for the IEEE WCCI-2020 competition on evolutionary computation for the electric vehicle routing problem, specifically designed for the competition.

dcterms:creator: M. M. Solomon
dcterms:description: A benchmark for vehicle routing and scheduling problems with time window constraints, widely used in routing problem research.
dcterms:title: Solomon benchmark

dcterms:description: Instances of the Capacitated Electric Vehicle Routing Problem (CEVRP) specifically from the IEEE WCCI 2020 competition, used for benchmarking algorithms.
dcterms:title: Instances of the CEVRP from the IEEE WCCI 2020 competition
